USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.5 - Table 9.5 Descriptor Types

Enumerator:
USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR  Device descriptor.

Possible bDescriptorType values for the descriptor structures. They can be used with Get Descriptor and Set Descriptor standard requests to retrieve/modify them

USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR  Configuration descriptor.
USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR  String descriptor.
USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR  Interface descriptor.
USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR  Endpoint descriptor.
USB_DEVICE_QUALIFIER_DESCRIPTOR  Device qualifier descriptor.
USB_OTHER_SPEED_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR  Other speed configuration descriptor
USB_INTERFACE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR  Interface power descriptor.

Definition at line 121 of file usbFramework.hpp.

00123     //! Possible bDescriptorType values for the descriptor structures.
00124     //! They can be used with Get Descriptor and Set Descriptor standard requests
00125     //! to retrieve/modify them
00126     //
00127     USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR                     = 0x01, //!< Device descriptor
00128     USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR              = 0x02, //!< Configuration descriptor
00129     USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR                     = 0x03, //!< String descriptor
00130     USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR                  = 0x04, //!< Interface descriptor
00131     USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR                   = 0x05, //!< Endpoint descriptor
00132     USB_DEVICE_QUALIFIER_DESCRIPTOR           = 0x06, //!< Device qualifier descriptor

USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.6.6 - Table 9.13 < bEndpointAddress field

Enumerator:
USB_ENDPOINT_OUT  Values for the bEndpointAddress field of an endpoint descriptor.

Defines an OUT endpoint

USB_ENDPOINT_IN  Defines an IN endpoint.

enum USB::EnumStandardDeviceRequests

Standard Device Requests.

These are the standard request defined for a SETUP transaction. Please refer to Section 9.4 of the USB 2.0 specification for more information. Table 9.4 defines the bRequest values for each request.

See also:
S_usb_request

USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.4

Enumerator:
USB_GET_STATUS  Returns the status for the specified recipient.
See also:
get_status_const

USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.4.5

USB_CLEAR_FEATURE  Disables a specific feature of the device

USB_SET_FEATURE  Enables a specific feature of the device

USB_RESERVED_REQ04  Reserved for future use.
USB_SET_ADDRESS  Sets the device address for subsequent accesses

USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.4.6
USB_GET_DESCRIPTOR  Returns the specified descriptor if it exists
See also:
USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.4.3
USB_SET_DESCRIPTOR  Updates existing descriptors or creates new descriptors. This request is optional.
See also:
USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.4.8
USB_GET_CONFIGURATION  Returns the current configuration value of the device.

USB_SET_CONFIGURATION  Sets the configuration of the device

See also:
USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.4.4
USB_SET_INTERFACE  Selects an alternate setting for the selected interface.

Clear/Set Feature - Constants.

Useful constants when declaring a Clear Feature or Set Feature standard request.

S_usb_request

USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.4 - Table 9.6 < Standard Feature Selectors

Enumerator:
USB_ENDPOINT_HALT  Halt feature of an endpoint.

Possible values for the wValue field of the Clear Feature and Set Feature standard requests.

USB_DEVICE_REMOTE_WAKEUP  Remote wake-up feature of the device.
USB_TEST_MODE  USB test mode.
